casebody.data:
Thomas HORNES, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
ROCHELLE PARK TOWNSHIP BOARD OF EDUCATION, Geoffrey W. Zoeller, Ed.D., in his official and individual capacity, Defendants-Movants,
and
John Does 1-10, and XYZ Corp. 1-10, Defendants. M-967 September Term 2018
082774 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 14, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
